name: Monitoring of petroleum industry information
text: §486B-1.5  Monitoring of petroleum industry information.  The public utilities commission or the department of business, economic development, and tourism shall refer to the attorney general any matter that is a violation of this chapter that is discovered in the performance of its duties pursuant to chapter 486H or 486J. [L 2007, c 182, §1; am L 2013, c 259, §2]
